name: SRK Tweaks
description:
Some small tweaks for the new layout on shoryuken.com

** This style is written assuming you're using SRK Light theme.

*** 6/9/11 UPDATE
-- Forces signatures to 11px font sizes

*** 5/31/11 UPDATE
-- Makes the "Most Recent" Threads/News on main forum page smaller.
-- "Most Recent" Threads/News hidden from account management pages.

*** 5/27/11 UPDATE
-- Hides sidebar on all pages except main forum listing.
-- Better-looking pagination links.

*** ORIGINAL RELEASE
-- More consistent fonts: No more Times New Roman post text.
-- Bigger, clearer, prettier button-ized Like/Reply links.
-- Customizable subforum highlighting: Make your favorite spots stand out.
-- Reduction of some minor clutter/noise.
-- Other minor visual tweaks & enhancements.
additional_info:
To add custom subforum highlighting, you'll need to edit the code and create your own custom style.  I recommend creating a secondary style in Stylish so that when this one updates it won't overwrite those changes.

In the code you'll see three selectors that hit .node_XX ... for each subforum you want to highlight you'll need to copy/paste those selectors and change the XX digits to the digits of the subforum you want to highlight.  For example, the SF4 Yun subforum is http://shoryuken.com/forum/forums/yun.48/ ... so to highlight that you'd change the selectors to .node_48 ... and that's it!
